cost_multipliers._comment: All costs in USD. per_element is base cost per affected item.

timeline_multipliers._comment: Time units: days for adjustment, weeks for systemic. avg_resolution_weeks_per_failure used to extrapolate schedule slippage.

severity_weights._comment: Numeric weights for impact scoring: higher = more severe

impact_thresholds._comment: Bands for UI legend rendering. Threshold is max value for that band.

metadata.description: Impact analysis configuration for reasoning layer. Defines cost/timeline computation, impact classification, and reporting preferences.

assumptions.cost_unit: dollars per item or per systemic fix
assumptions.time_unit: weeks for systemic, days for adjustments
